name: Anaglypta
description:
[PROOF OF CONCEPT]

Anaglypta is a  2D aesthetic, story driven game in which you are tasked to find a legendary source of unlimited power that was lost to your people long ago. However, the very journey you embark on reveals to you the hidden past of your kind that leaves you to wonder whether the path you are on is the right one to take - who is friend or foe, and what cause is truly just?

Anaglypta was developed as part of a group thesis project, and serves as a proof of concept for what the IP could look like. Anaglypta is not in active development.

IP by Julius Osuyos. This was uploaded on his behalf.

Team:
Julius Osuyos
Tyla Price
